alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a metalloid atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Organosilicon compounds with the general formula R(Si(R')(R\"))nX (R =  aliphatic chain, R'-R\" =H, C, or halogen atom, X = halogen atom).
alternative_parents.name: Alkylhalosilanes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organofluorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl fluoride functional group with formula R-F , where R is an alkyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl fluorides

class.description: Organic compounds containing a metalloid atom.
class.name: Organometalloid compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as organochlorosilanes. These are organosilicon compounds where the tetravalent silicon atom is linked to one or more chlorine atoms.

direct_parent.description: Organosilicon compounds where the tetravalent silicon atom is linked to one or more chlorine atoms.
direct_parent.name: Organochlorosilanes

intermediate_nodes.description: Organosilicon compounds where the tetravalent silicon atom is linked to one or more heteroatoms.
intermediate_nodes.name: Organoheterosilanes

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a C[Si] bond.
subclass.name: Organosilicon compounds

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and metal atom.
superclass.name: Organometallic compounds
